scripts.build: yarn gen-prod-env && yarn fix-nexus-prisma && yarn build:web && tsc
scripts.build:full: yarn build && npx pkg . && yarn bundle && yarn clean
scripts.bundle: mkdir bundle && yarn copy-bundle-binaries && cd bundle && mv ../server aard && mv ../../web/dist/index.html . && mv ../../web/dist/assets . && mkdir prisma && cp -R ../prisma/migrations prisma && cp ../prisma/schema.prisma prisma
scripts.copy-bundle-binaries: cd bundle && mkdir lib && cp ../../../node_modules/@prisma/engines/migration-engine-debian-openssl-1.1.x lib && cp ../../../node_modules/esbuild-linux-64/bin/esbuild lib
scripts.p:migrate: dotenv -c development -- npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.p:push: dotenv -c development -- npx prisma db push
scripts.p:seed: dotenv -c development -- npx prisma db seed
scripts.localci: rm -rf ../../../release && rm -rf bundle && yarn build:full && mv bundle ../../../release && cd ../../../release
